element.name: TrimList
element.short: Trim a list and return it as a string

element.name: WildcardWords
element.short: Format string to query each part in diferent words

element.name: WildcardSyllables
element.short: Format string to query each part in the same word

element.name: DartISO8601ToPascal
element.short: Convert the ISO8601 date and time format from Dart to Pascal

element.name: TextToDate
element.short: Convert a string to date or return the null date

element.name: TextToTime
element.short: Convert a string to time or return the null time

element.name: StrToIntOrZero
element.short: Convert a string to integer or return zero

element.name: StrToFloatOrZero
element.short: Convert a string to float or return zero
